1.content: Let's get things started shall we? You're a human that stumble upon the pokemon world. First off, are a male or female?
1.title: In the Pokemon World

11.content: Okay, your a male human that woke up in the pokemon world, but your find yourself very strange. And by strange I mean...
11.title: Male

111.content: Suddenly you hear giant footsteps heading your way. The pokemon is...
111.title: Giant Pokemon

1111.content: A giant Pikachu appear before you. This pokemon is so huge, you estimate it to be...
1111.title: Pikachu

choices: Ask him to do something else for him.
11111.content: The giant pokemon saw you and pounced on you softly carefully not squishing you. You were able to stick your head out of the pikachu's paws only to find yourself being licked constantly. This giant pokemon licked you like you were a lollipop. You couldn't resist laughing, because the tongue tickles. You find the giant pikachu to be happy. The yellow fur on its body is filled with electricity which stiffens your hair like crazy. You find the giant pikachu the cutest pokemon you ever seen. Suddenly the giant pikachu stopped licking you. You turn to the giant pokemon to find him looking at you with its mouth open and its tongue sticking out. It looks like it wants you to climb into his mouth. You're unsure about the situation until you come to a decision...
11111.title: A 10,000 foot pikachu

111111.content: You grab onto the giant pokemon tongue and pull yourself into the mouth. You laid your back on the pokemon's tongue as the mouth began to close. Your eyes now adjust to the darkness you're in. The tongue began to move to lick you once again. It was even more fun to be lick from the inside of the mouth than outside. You were soon covered in saliva from all the licking. Pikachu then stopped the licking, and he open his mouth again. You're thinking about climbing out of the mouth, you were also thinking about being swallowed alive. You came to a decision to...
111111.title: Inside Pikachu's Mouth

1111112.content: You told the pikachu to swallow you, but not until you take off your clothes. So Pikachu kept his mouth open, while you take off your clothes. The only clothes you kept on is your underwear. The rest of the clothes were thrown out of Pikachu's mouth. You then told the Pikachu that you're ready. The Pikachu now close its mouth and lift his head up. You find the throat muscles open up. You begin to slide down towards the throat. You pass the uvula and drop down into the throat as you hear a gulping sound. You slide down the throat slowly. A minute later, you reach the end and fall down into the stomach. You find the digestive juices not affecting you. You know that the pikachu didn't want to hurt you at all. You then hear another gulping sound and saw a berry came from the esophagus. It looks like Pikachu brought you something to eat. You eat the berry like your were starving. After you ate the entire berry, you decide to take a nap. From outside the pikachu rub his belly in satisfaction. While you were sleeping, you were thinking about either getting out or staying in Pikachu's tummy for a little longer. Where will the story go next?
1111112.title: From the mouth to the belly

11112.content: The pikachu picks you up and starts to lick you. It licks you all over your body, covering you in its saliva. You start to laugh because it tickles you as it goes over your body. The pikachu can tell that you like this and continues to lick. Then after minutes of licking, the pikachu stops and opens its mouth so you can get a look inside. You have to make a big decision now.
11112.title: 1,000 feet tall.

111121.content: You tell the pikachu yes but only for a few minutes. You jump on to the wet tongue and lied down, the pikachu closes its mouth. As you lay on its tongue, you decide to get up and look around. The tongue is covered with saliva and there is a pool of it below you. The teeth are small so you know you won't get hurt. The mouth is really hot so you take off your clothes and leave your underwear on and sit back down. As you sit on the tongue, the pikachu moves it and you fall into the pool of spit. You are soon covered in the slimy substance and you slip around. From all of the saliva in the mouth, the pikachu lifts its head back and the saliva you are in goes down its thoat. The pikachu makes a big gulp and you are pushed down the esophagus. Once you reach the stomach, you start to hit the soft walls and yell. The pikachu has realized what it has done and tries to get you out but its no use.
111121.title: Inside the mouth.

choices: Wait in Pikachu's belly to be digested or regurgitate
1111211.content: You tried to escape by climbing back up the esophagus, unfortunately you can't get through. There's only one way out of pikachu's tummy, but you don't think its a good idea. Pikachu is still trying to find a way to regurgitate you. What will you do?
1111211.title: Options to get out.

choices: He finds a way, you live!
11112112.content: Does Pikachu find a way to regurgitate you? Or is it not fast enough and you're nothing but pika chow?
11112112.title: Is this it?

choices: Tell it you want to enter its mouth
Offer to get licked some more
111122.content: You politely refuse to enter, and the Pikachu sighs, his ears lowering. You sigh, guilt welling up inside you. You have to make things right somehow...
111122.title: Refuse politely to the chu

1112.content: You saw a Charizard, and a big huge one. But how huge?
1112.title: Charizard

11121.content: You're minding your own business when a 500 ft. Charizard walks by you. You notice that the Charizard is female. She looks down at you, picks you up and brings her hands up to about her neck level. You shout, "PLEASE DON'T EAT ME!" and start crying when she:
11121.title: 500 Feet

111212.content: She puts her hands up to her cheek and nuzzles you against her face. Awwwww she lieks you. Your crying quiets down to sniffling and you accept her warm snuggle. She pulls her hands down to neck and starts licking you. You enjoy it. Next she....
111212.title: Snuggles you

choices: Play it safe and stay on her hand.
1112121.content: she brings you up to her mouth and then opens it up. it seemed like she wanted you to go in. it does seem inviting, but she'll probably eat you. at least she's giving you an option. you decide to...
1112121.title: Invites you into her maw

11123.content: You're impressed by how huge the Charizard is. The Charizard has spotted you standing next to his massive feet. You then got scared, and couldn't move, because fear has paralyzed you. Charizard finds you very interesting. He extend his hand down for you to climb on. You felt like you have no choice. So you reluctantly climb on. Charizard gently lift you up from the ground to get a better look at you. You were scared stiff, afraid of what he would do to you. You don't know what happens next.
11123.title: That's one giant Charizard

choices: You always want to be inside a pokemon's mouth
111232.content: You find Charizard sticking his tongue out and touch you with it. You realized that he likes you. And wants to lick you to show how much he does. You don't know what to say, and let Charizard's saliva soak you and your clothes. Charizard licked you for minutes, and then stop. You then find that Charizard has his mouth open wide. It seems that Charizard wants you to go inside. Will you accept his invitation?
111232.title: The Licking Charizard

1112321.content: You ask Charizard if you could take your clothes off first. Charizard nodded and waits for you to take all of your clothes off. All except your underwear. When Charizard saw you drop your clothes to the ground, he reopen his mouth for you to climb in. You find the tongue to be very squishy. You lay against Charizard's warm tongue. Charizard closes his mouth, and loves how you snuggle on his tongue. He licked you from the inside of his mouth, you loved that very much. You then had a pretty good idea. What will he do?
1112321.title: Inside Charizard's Maw

11123211.content:
Charizard wonders what you are thinking. You ran towards the back of Charizard's throat, and dive down. Charizard notice your action, and helps you by swallowing you. You then slide down the esophagus, loving your idea. You then suddenly land with a splash inside Charizard huge belly. Who would've thought you'd be inside a tummy of a Charizard. You notice that the stomach acids don't affect you that proves that Charizard never wants to harm you at all. You decide to take a nap against the walls of Charizard's tummy, and you find it relaxing. Charizard patted his belly finding you safe and sound inside.

If you want to continue the story, you know what to do. If not, just end the story.
11123211.title: In the Belly of Charizard

11131.content:
how long is he gonna be?
add whatever you like =]
11131.title: Lugia

11132.content:
It was a snorlax.
You knew that even at its regular size you would be half its height at best, but this one was a mountain.
As it strolled past every step felt like an earthquake, causing you to fall to the ground. You decided to stay down and hopefully it would end soon. When suddenly an even larger quake hit sending you flying and hitting into the side of the now sitting snorlax...
11132.title: Snorlax

11133.content: What about a giant Eevee?
11133.title: other

111331.content: Suddenly, a giant Eevee comes rushing out of the forest ahead, bolting past overhead. As it rushes above, you look up to see the Eevee's private parts, confirming it to be female. She just notices you and stops, turns around and start walking towards you. Unsure of what to do, you wait for her to come to you. When she's infront of you she lays on her side, watching you. After a while she opens her mouth. You get the feeling she wants to eat you, but something tells you that it will be safe. As she rolls out her tongue like a red carpet, you move towards....
111331.title: Yes! This one.

1113321.content: How long is the Lickitung?
1113321.title: Lickitung

11133212.content:
As you walk trough the peaceful forest. You hear something stomping towards your way. You look around to see what it was. While you were walking you bumped into something pink. While you looked up you realized it was an giant Lickitung! You've never seen a Lickitung THAT big. The giant Pokemon layed down its paw. It seemed that it wanted you to get on it.
What will you do?
11133212.title: 10,000 feet tall

111332121.content: You had a hard time climbing on it's paw... But you made it though! The giant Lickitung lifted it's paw. He opened his jaw and slowly got it's paw closer to it. You were terrified to be eaten, but then he suddenly stopped. His tongue came out and licked you all wet in saliva. You were pretty relieved, he seems to like you. He kept on licking you. You're clothes were all wet in saliva but you really liked it. Then there was an idea popping up in you're head! You asked him if you could come in it's mouth. The Lickitung thinked for a second and then decided to...
111332121.title: Get on his paw.

choices: Dive into it's throat. Believing he won't hurt you.
1113321211.content: The Lickitung joyfully nodded his head like he was saying yes and took out his tongue so you could climb on. You first asked if you could take off you're clothes so it would be more enjoyable for you and the Lickitung. The Lickitung nodded again. You take out you're clothes who are still covered in saliva and jumped onto the tongue. The Lickitung took his tongue back into it's jaw. You dropped yourself on its tongue and the Lickitung played around with you in it's mouth. You laughed and had an very good time. Then you realized you were getting drowsy. You asked for the Lickitung for an sleeping place. The Lickitung then lifted its tongue and pointed at it's throat. You seem to be doubting about it. Becuase things in stomachs always digest doesn't it? You decide to...
1113321211.title: Accept your offer.

11133212111.content: You decided to go in it's stomach. You walk towards it's throat and joyfully jumped in it. The Lickitung helped you get in it's stomach by heading his head up and swallowing you. An gulp sound was heard and you land in the gastric juice. You were scared at first but didn't get hurt at all.. You were relieved yet again. You softly rubbed the stomach of the Lickitung and the Lickitung purr in enjoyment. You then fall asleep in its stomach. The Lickitung lied onto the ground and rubbed it's belly, and fell asleep too.
11133212111.title: Dive into it's throat. Believing he won'...

1113322.content: These are the last two, take em or leave em.
1113322.title: other

11133222.content: Tyranitar then? (Didn't want to leave. Like this Licking Pokemon thing. :3)
11133222.title: Tyranitar

choices: Go somewhere else, you don't like forests!
1113322221.content: You walk out of the town for your first time, looking around as you saw a large forest on ahead of you. You looked at the forest and then decided to...
1113322221.title: Sure. I'll do it.

choices: You actually sirvived due it's water what's down there.
11133222211.content: As you walk on further you suddenly fell, noticing it was a cliff. You watch down and then cover you're eyes, when...
11133222211.title: Walk furtheron ahead.

111332222111.content: As you fell down you land in something soft breaking your fall. You open you're eyes to see that it's actually all hair. You sniffed as you smelled a horrible smell. Then something began to came down on you. The same color of the skin where the hair was. You then layed down to avoid getting crushed. You then got between the things. You began to smell the horrible smell again. Now coming out of an sort of liquid. You got complety soaked in it. You then realize to it's figure of it being fully haired and that something on it can close it. You realize that you're in a armpit. ''Pretty gross'' you thought by yourself. But you are alive, and that's what counts. Suddenly...
111332222111.title: You land in something soft.

choices: Play some more on the gigantic Slaking.
1113322221111.content: You looked up as the arm went up too. You stood up as something picked you up. ( Too much Up. o_o ) It then holded you to its face. It's then looking at you, while you look at the thing yourself. You looked down at it's face to see that it's a Slaking lying down. And it was GIANT. The Slaking then began getting you closer to it's face. It sniffed you with his gigantic nose, liking you're stench from his perspiration. It then suddenly dropped you in it's nose, making you stuck in there. You then got sneezed out of it's nose again. Making you bounce up from his pretty fat belly between it's toes. He then began getting you from toe from toe, looking at you with a smile. It didn't seem to want to hurt you. It seemed to be playing with you. It then throwed, with his feet, you up again and making you land on it's gigantic belly. You seemed to like him and he seemed to like you. In a good gross way. You then decide to...
1113322221111.title: The arm goes up.

11133222211111.content: You jumped up on his belly. Running to it's face. You jumped back in it's nose, making him sneeze again and launch you into it's belly, making you fly up getting catched in the Slaking's armpit. You then layed down again, making the Slaking get down it's arm. You actually now like it's stench very much, and rolled into its' perspiration. Making you soaked wet again. You then layed down calmy, loving the warmth of the Slaking's armpit. You then after a while get out of Slaking's armpit and this time jump in it's bellybutton. You relaxingly sat in the hairy bellybutton. You again relaxed, then jumping out, jumping in the Slaking's nose, making him sneeze and land in his toes. You then again got from toe to toe. The Slaking then throwed you up with it's feet, making you land on the Slaking's gigantic fat belly again. You then began sitting, when the Slaking began...
11133222211111.title: Play some more on the gigantic Slaking.

choices: You jump in the Slaking's mouth for more enjoyable moments.
111332222111111.content: You sat down and looked at the Slaking's face when he suddenly opened it's mouth, with his gigantic tongue coming out. It began licking all over you. Liking how you tasted. You laughed while you were totally covered in saliva. The Slaking began wrapping you around with it's tongue, rubbing you the whole time. You loved the feeling and then got an idea.
111332222111111.title: The Slaking began licking you.

1113322221111111.content: The Slaking non-stopped licking while you got an idea. You look at the Slaking and asked if you could go into it's mouth. The Slaking then...
1113322221111111.title: You jump in the Slaking's mouth for more en...

11133222211111111.content: The Slaking began to smile and opened it's mouth. You asked if you could take off your clothes first. The Slaking nodded, and you completely took your clothes off, except your underwear. You then began to ran and dove into the Slaking's mouth. The Slaking closed it's mouth and then began playing with you in it's mouth. Turning you around. Wrapping you stuck between it's tongue, you loved it all! You were totally soaked in saliva but you didn't care! You hugged the giant tongue, making the Slaking lick you all over. You relaxed while hugging the giant tongue. Falling asleep.
11133222211111111.title: Accepted.

choices: You wanted to slide down it's throat.
You were gonna play some more on him.
111332222111111111.content: Later you wake up on the tongue, proving it that your gigantic fat Slaking is still alive and you were still in it's awesome mouth. You then looked around again. Looking from the teeth to the throat. When you looked at the throat you got an idea.
111332222111111111.title: Some while later.

1113322221111111111.content: The Slaking began to sit on it's gigantic butt, making you roll over it's tongue to the teeth. The Slaking then catched you with its tongue in reflex. You then thanked him saying: ''Thanks, Slaking. But.. You know. To the time being in your wonderful body. I looked at your throat and..'' The Slaking nodded. He already knew what you wanted to do. The Slaking rubbed you again then pushed you with it's tongue to the top of it's tongue, and the side of it's throat. You look at the throat. You jumped down it's throat as the Slaking began to swallow you down. You slide through the throat and then make your way in it's enormous fat belly. You landed in the gastric juice, panicking, but it didn't hurt you at all. You then walked to the Slaking's belly, rub the inside of him, making him purr a little, what Slaking's rarely do. The Slaking patted and rubbed it's belly and went to your hand. It was like a high belly-hand five! You then sit down in your fat giant buddy, while the Slaking is still rubbing you, making you fall asleep in it's giant belly. You now closed your eyes, you were safe, in your fat giant Slaking's belly.
1113322221111111111.title: You wanted to slide down it's throat.

choices: You got stuck in the purple lake.
11133222221.content: It was on the news. It really is true! What's true? That there suddenly had appeared an giant purple lake. You walk up to the the purple lake, looking at the plants, it looked like a dangerous jungle now. Suddenly...
11133222221.title: ... sure.

choices: You get sucked into the slime.
111332222211.content: You wanted to walk away when you turned around, but you were stuck with you're feet in the lake! You struggled and got free, but then faceplanted with you're face into the mud.You then feel a slimy feeling on you're legs, you were startled and wanted to stand up and run away, but you couldn't do anything. Then the slime goes all over you. You feel the slime slushing all over you, when...
111332222211.title: You got stuck in the purple lake.

1113322222111.content: The purplish slime gets off you, making you relieved. You stand up, wiping off some mud while looking behind you. You then look towards a large purple sludge. What am I saying? Giant even! You look up to see that it's a giant Muk. You were startled about it's size, you just stood there, looking afraid. The Muk then picked you up, you panicked and began struggling for freedom. The Muk then placed you on it's other sludgy hand, as he just looked at you. You looked at the Muk's face, which was smiling now. It didn't seem to want to hurt you. You decide to..
1113322222111.title: The Slime goes off you.

choices: Go home and come back later.
11133222221111.content: You looked at the Muk. It looked like it wanted you to stay. You said: ''Okay.. I'll stay.'' The Muk smiled very happily. You began to yawn. You look at the Muk and thought.. ''I really want to stay.. But I'm sleepy.'' You decide to..
11133222221111.title: Stay.

11133222222.content: This maybe your only chance. Do you want a giant Salazzle? Or do you want something else?
11133222222.title: Nnnnnnope.

111332222221.content: Wela Volcano was where you wanted to visit, but not in just any way. You recently heard of a giant Salazzle living there, but it could be the Totem Pokémon that you battled during your 4th trial on your Island Challenge. For some reason, she wanted you to stay with her. Salazzle was interested in having you to keep her company. But how does she do it?
111332222221.title: Salazzle

1113322222211.content: You are surprised to find yourself in her cave. Since you were here, you thought about where to sleep. Although she couldn't talk or use telepathy, Salazzle could still understand what you want her to do. Does she allow you to sleep near her belly or on her belly?
1113322222211.title: Salazzle's cave

1113322222212.content: You realised that you were in Salazzle's mouth. You were wondering about how you got in there. Putting two and two together, you realised that Salazzle wanted you to be 'really' close to her. You finally understand that she was kind and didn't want to hurt you.
1113322222212.title: Salazzle's mouth

11133222222121.content: You were still in Salazzle's mouth, but she decided to keep you in there. Where did Salazzle want you to sleep?
11133222222121.title: Keeps you in her mouth

112.content: You thought that this was a strange size for you, and wondered if you will ever get back to your normal size or not. As you were thinking this, you saw a giant Pokémon coming towards you. You were quite scared about this and tried to run away, but the giant Pokémon trapped you under its talons. But was it Ho-oh? Or another bird Pokémon?
112.title: shrunk to 1 foot tall.

1121.content: I'm in so much trouble, you thought. Although you were curious about what Ho-oh was thinking, you couldn't talk your way out of this situation, since Ho-oh can't communicate by talking or by telepathy. Also, since you were normally about 5 feet tall, which is about 1.3 metres, Ho-oh would normally be 3.8 metres tall, but at your small size of 1 foot tall, which is about 0.3 metres, he looked to be about 5 times taller than normal, Ho-oh seemed to be 19 metres tall. What do you think he will do with you?
1121.title: Ho-oh

1122.content: Was the bird Pokémon either a Braviary or a Mandibuzz, or was it a different Pokémon? If Braviary is your choice, it will be a very quick thinking predator. If you want Mandibuzz, it would wait until you end up tired, no matter where you go. If it's a different Pokémon, depending on the Pokémon, it could take an extremely long time before they consider letting you out, possibly a couple of years.
1122.title: Other Bird Pokémon

11223.content: What about Noivern, the Sound Wave Pokémon? Keep in mind that you have to be able to withstand any loud noises it can make. Or was it something else?
11223.title: A different Pokémon

113.content: You found yourself at the size of 6 inches. You're trying to calm yourself but suddenly a shadow looms over you. Looking up you see a...
113.title: shrunk to 6 inches tall.

11322.content:
You're surprised to see none other than the legendary Mewtwo itself and you try to run away but suddenly you're lifted up in the air and are brought up to it's face.
You realize this is Mewtwo using Psychic and suddenly Mewtwo makes a noice showing it's female. As you sit in the air you're feeling nervous untill she gently hugs you with her arms and she gently smiles to you trying to show she doesn't mean any harm.

You start feeling a bit calm but suddenly she licks over your head. "What was that for?" You ask and she keeps licking over your body somethimes sucking your head into her mouth which does allow you to look inside her mouth. You do enjoy the feeling a little as she's licking over you with her soft tongue but you're afraid of what could follow up soon. She might want to eat you up and you're afraid what it might be like inside her stomach but she might also try something else.
what happens next?
11322.title: Female

choices: You stay to see who is making those footsteps.
You try to get away as you planned.
115.content: You can't believe it, you have shrunk to a size of a normal mouse. You find the grass growing over you, even the berries are bigger than you. You want to revert back to normal size, but you don't know how. Just then you hear giant footsteps, but you don't want to stay to find out, or do you?
115.title: shrunk to 1 inch tall.

1151.content: As you prepared to face the one who is making those huge footsteps, you closed your eyes hoping that it is all just a dream, and that you are asleep in your own bed, in your own room, in your own house, in your own world (I'm guessing, you're tired of the "in your own" quote). The footsteps sounded closer and closer until the footsteps stop. You open your eyes slowly, and slowly, until you see a pair of two black feet. You were amazed to find feet that is so huge to you. You looked up to find that those feet belong to...
1151.title: Giant Footsteps

11511.content: You looked up to the Gleam Eyes Pokemon, Luxray. You were both scared and amazed by the size the Luxray, well you should since you are 1 Inch tall. You get a good look at the Luxray's mane and confirm that it's a male. The Luxray spotted you immediately, softly pounced on you carefully not to hurt his prey. You could barely move in the Pokemon's paw. The Luxray was surprised to find you very tiny. You were brought closer to Luxray's mouth. Just when you thought it couldn't get any worse, the Pokemon open his mouth. Suddenly something unexpected happened. The Luxray was just giving you a friendly lick. The Luxray was friendly from the start. Luxray then loosens his grip for you, you were thinking about leaving. What will you do?
11511.title: Luxray

115112.content: You decide to stay a little longer. You remain on the Luxray's paw, and Luxray continues you to lick you. He licked all over your tiny little body, you find yourself all covered in drool. Even your clothes got all wet. You decide to take off your clothes, your shirt, your pants, your shoes and socks, but not your underwear. The Luxray continues to lick you constantly. You were actually enjoying Luxray's constant licking. You've enjoyed it so much that you want to do something that you will actually regret. You want to climb into Luxray's mouth. You asked Luxray about it, what will he do?
115112.title: Stay a little longer

1151121.content: You walk up to the Luxray, and gently open his mouth. Luxray stick his tongue out til its between your legs. You lay on the Luxray soft tongue as he gently pulls you in. As you are coming into the mouth you find that it is warm, and nice. As your legs passed Luxray's teeth, Luxray closed his mouth. You find yourself in total darkness, but you can feel Luxray's tongue giving you another lick. You've enjoyed it very much wishing it would never end. You are now soaked completely, you want to have more fun. You told the Luxray that he can do whatever he wants for him. What does Luxray do?
1151121.title: Going in

11511211.content: You were looking at the fainted light coming between Luxray's teeth. You find that your are being pulled away from it. You are then slide towards the back of the throat. You are about to be swallowed. Outside, Luxray lifted his head and made a gulping sound. Inside, you are going through the esophagus. They were a little ticklish as you are coming down. After a few seconds, you land in the stomach of Luxray. Outside, Luxray let out a huge belch, and began to lay on his side and patted his belly. While inside Luxray's tummy, you settle down in the stomach acids finding that they do not affect you and took a nice nap. You can end the story here if you like, if not then click "continue"
11511211.title: Inside Luxray's tummy

11511212.content: Luxray open his mouth again, he stick a finger of his paw into it. You climbed onto it as Luxray brings you out of his mouth. He close his mouth and gently set you down on the ground. Luxray yawned getting tired. You felt tired too. Luxray then let out his paw for you to climb on again, you rest calmly as Luxray closed his eyes and began to sleeplicking. Licking you in his sleep, imagine that. You wish that you could remain 1 inch tall, maybe next you can sleep in Luxray's belly. Maybe, just maybe...
11511212.title: Back outside

11512.content: You estimate the Lucario to be 100 feet tall compared to you. Lucario was looking down on you. You were scared at the amazement of the Lucario. Lucario gave you a little smile, and kneeled down to grab you. What would you do?
11512.title: Lucario

choices: You told Lucario to swallow you.
115121.content: You suddenly found yourself in the paw of Lucario. You were soon brought up to the maw of the 100 foot Lucario. You closed your eyes not wanting to see what happens. You suddenly felt something wet on the side of your face. You open your eyes to find that it was the tongue. This Lucario was giving you a lick. He licked you constantly, showing that he likes you. You were soon covered in saliva. You decide to take off your clothes. You only left your underwear on, cause you don't want Lucario to see you naked. Lucario picked up your clothes and set them on the spike in his chest. How nice, Lucario is letting it dry. Lucario then continued on with the licking. And find it to be quiet soothing. Lucario wanted to bring you home, but he will not stop licking. So he decide to bring you into his maw. You lay down on Lucario's tongue, enjoying the warm air inside Lucario's mouth. The tip of the tongue was tickling you as well. It was very soothing. Several minutes later, Lucario came up to an empty cabin, which he called home. Lucario is about to spit you out, but you didn't want to come out yet.
115121.title: Let him grab you.

1151211.content: When Lucario heard you wanting to be swallowed, he did as you command. The tongue lifted so you can slide down towards the throat. You find yourself squeezing through the tunnel, which is the esophagus. You eventually land with a splash inside Lucario's stomach. You then hear another gulping sound, and saw two berries coming down. It looks like Lucario got you something to eat. You ravenously devour one of the berries, cause you were hungry. You left the other berry alone for Lucario to digest. Luckily for you it doesn't affect you. You decide to spend the night in Lucario's tummy. Lucario felt tired as well and went to the couch to rest.
1151211.title: Inside Lucario's belly

11513.content: You looked up to find that those feet belong to a Mightyena. The Mightyena looks down at you and smiles. You are about to run when the pokemon's paw lands on top of you. You struggle to free yourself as you see its mouth getting closer to you. You close your eyes because you are about to get eaten, but all you feel is something wet brush against your body. The Mightyena is licking you. It is licking you with its wet tongue. You laugh as the tongue rolls over your body and coats you in sticky saliva.The Mightyena sees that you are enjoying this and wants to make it better for you. It stops licking you and opens its mouth. It wants you to go in its mouth. Do you go in?
11513.title: Mightyena licking you

choices: Not popped and you are still stuck inside it
115131.content:
You tell the Mightyena that you would like to go in. You get up and walk over to its mouth. You step on to the soft tongue and lie down. The Mightyena draws its tongue in and closes its mouth shut. You look around inside the mouth and find that it is covered in saliva and it is also humid. You decide to take off your clothes, leaving on your underwear, and lie on its tongue. The Mightyena now starts to lick you from the inside of its mouth. You get covered all over with saliva more than you did on the outside and it sticks to your skin, making your body become really gooey. Both you and Mighyena like this and continue to do this.

Mightyena keeps covering you with its slippery saliva and laughs a little, shaking its head. During this time, you are moving further back to the Mightyena's throat. You look behind you and get up. Once you get up, you slip and fall into the throat. The Mightyena's reaction was to swallow. It makes a few big gulps and you start to slide down its esophagus while trying to get back up to the mouth. On the outside, there is a lump going down the throat and it then disappears. The Mighyena gets worried about you. You fall into the stomach and get prepared to be digested. Only thing is, the acids aren't harming you. You are relieved as you lay against the wall of the stomach. You yell up to hope Mightyena heard you. Luckily, it did. So it keeps you in the stomach for the rest of the day.

As you look around the stomach, it is covered with saliva and mucus. Not to mention the acids, which is a green, thick, and slimy substance that you get covered in from time to time. You look around the stomach some more, but its a little dark now. You then hear something coming down the esophagus. It is a berry. The Mightyena wants you to eat it. You walk over to it and take a bite of it. The berry is covered in thick, slimy spit but you don't care. The spit stays in your mouth and makes it really gooey. Every time you breathe out, a bubble forms. At one moment, you exhale and form a spit bubble so thick and gooey that it engulfs you and you get stuck in it. You try to break the bubble by biting and clawing at it, but it's too thick and slimy to break. So you decide to go to sleep in your gooey bubble and wait till morning to try and get out. When you wake up the next morning, you find out that the bubble has.....
115131.title: Go into its mouth and into the belly

121.content: How big, or do you shrink?
121.title: You want to be with Mawile

choices: She puts you in her mouth--the real one--and swishes you around
She puts you in her mouth--the fake one--and carries you away in it
1211.content:
You shiver against the cold of the cave, wishing you had never entered it. You're just glad that you haven't encountered any wild Pokemon yet, as you do not have any Pokemon of your am to fight them with. Still, you hope that you reach the end soon, as you've spent too long inside the cave already.

As you walk, you enter a large cavernous room, and though little light exists in this part of the cave, you can see a huge shadowy form on the opposite end of the cave. You stop walking and grab your Pokedex to scan the giant creature, expecting to see that it is an Onix or some other large Pokemon. But to your surprise, your Pokedex tells you that the creature is a female Mawile, a kind of Pokemon that is usually just two feet tall. But this Pokemon must be many times that, and many times your size too. It seems to stand 50 feet tall, reaching almost to the ceiling of the cave.

You look up from your dex and gasp. A pair of dimly glowing red lights, hovering several stories off the ground, are aimed right at you. The gigantic Pokemon has spotted you, her red eyes focusing on your comparatively tiny form. The shadowy form moves, and the cave rumbles as it she towards you. You stare at it her fear, unable to run.

In just a few steps, she has reached you, and now that she is closer, you can see her better and tell that she is indeed a Mawile, except she is about 50 feet tall.The Mawile looks down at you, her head slightly cocked to the side as she observes you. Meanwhile, you stand still and hope that it doesn't hurt you, as this is definitely a dangerous spot for you to be in.

The Mawile, after a few more moments of staring at you, reaches down with a hand. You suspect she is going to pick you up, but you still can't move. You just stay still as her hand reaches you and the fingers wrap around you in a painfully tight fist. The Mawile lifts you up to her face, her gigantic red eyes crossing to look at you. You don't bother to squirm, knowing that it would be hopeless.

The Mawile stares at you and you stare back, and after a few more seconds, she moves you closer to her face, and then, she opens her mouth. Her tongue sticks out and licks your face, the soft and slimy muscle morphing around your head as it slowly slides up and off. You gasp for air as she retracts her tongue and smacks her lips, pondering your taste.

Even still, you don't squirm, as you can tell that you could easily fit inside this Pokemon's maw. And that's referring to her real mouth, the smaller of her two mouths. That size difference between you and her petrifies you, and you just continue to hope that she will spare you.
1211.title: 50 foot Mawile

122.content: How big is the Smoochum?
122.title: Smoochum

1222.content:
Continuing your journey of exploring strange lands of the world, you notice a massive foot print in the ground. You decide to investigate what could have possibly created a print so large, you began to scan the immediate area. After hours of not finding any living being that made the print, you decide to call it a night, and take a nap near the giant foot print.

You stare up at the night sky and look at the moon, which is in the shape of a letter 'U', but you weren't surprised by that. Eventually you fall asleep.

You awake to the sounds of explosions in the short distance. You stand on your feet and rush towards the source of the sounds. You finally find the source; A gigantic pokemon, bigger than most you have ever seen, but you can't tell exactly which one it is, so you try to get close enough to see what it was.

The giant pokemon turns around and notices you. It was a massive Smoochum. The kiss pokemon had to be no less than 90 feet tall. She flashes a menacing smile at you and licks her huge lips.

Before you could react, the giant Smoochum use her Attract on you, and you fell in love with her (Regardless of gender ;D). You were prevented from escape. She picks you up with her giant hands (Paws?) and lifts you up to her face.

She then...
1222.title: Giant Blonde Pokemon.

choices: Let's you regain your sences and escape.
12221.content:
... Uses her Lick on you, and you became completely covered in her warm, gooey saliva. It was apparent that she enjoyed your taste and that it was inevitable that she would eat you whole, but the giant Smoochum decided to have a bit of fun before doing so.

She laid flat on her back with you still in hand and crushed a bunch of trees in the process. She places you on her chest, and opens her mouth. You stare in confusion at what she is doing. You want to escape, but for some reason you feel that you must stay with the giant Smoochum.

For some strange reason you began to hear voices in your head, telling you to walk into Smoochum's mouth. You stand still, but then the voices become louder, and more persuasive, so you begin to walk towards her mouth.

You reach her bottom lip and climb up and into her mouth. You stop on the tongue, and lay down on your front as commanded by the strange voices.

Smoochum closes her mouth trapping you inside. She begins to chuckle a little over how easy it was to get you inside. She then uses her tongue to swerve you around inside for a while.

She then...
12221.title: Uses Licks on you.

choices: Stay in the stomach and wait.
122211.content: She then tilts her head back to swallow you. You slide into her throat and she makes a big gulp. You are now squeezing yourself through the sticky esophagus. You then squeeze yourself through a hole that leads you to the stomach. The stomach is hot, squishy, and has saliva all over it. The smoochum lets out a small burp and pats her belly. You bang on the stomach walls to make the smoochum throw you up but it's no use. What do you do now?
122211.title: Swallows you.

1222111.content: You try to find a way out of Smoochum's stomach but then you think to yourself which way do you go? Up or down?
1222111.title: Find a way out.

info.brief_description: This story is about giant pokemon licking you, and possibly eat you.
info.description:
This story is about you as the main character being licked by giant pokemon in the pokemon world. Here's a list of things about this story:

1. There's vore, in case the giant pokemon wants to eat the main character.
2. I will allow footplay, to make licking easier.
3. I will not allow deaths in this story, so no hard vore, or crushing.
4. I will however, allow digestion just as long as there are no deaths.
5. I won't allow other gay sex stuff, unless I say so.
6. If the main character should be naked, make sure their private stuff are covered, and by private stuff, I mean penis, boobs, and well you get the picture.
7. Make sure that all pokemon are giant, I want the main character to be very tiny to the pokemon.
8. I won't allow anthros. I want normal pokemon. No anthros Please!
9. And furthermore, the Pokemon should not speak, not even telepathy. I will, however, allow body language.

Make a lot chapters for this story and have fun. Oh, and one more thing, if I find any chapters that violate my rules, I'm gonna delete them. And be sure to check your spelling after every chapter, if I find any misspelling, I'll correct them for you. I will try to add some myself.
